statements: INSERT INTO PatientMedicalRecords (patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, treatment) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'Fever', 'Rest');
INSERT INTO PatientMedicalRecords (patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, treatment) VALUES (2, 'Jane Smith', 'Cold', 'Medication');

INSERT INTO PatientMedicalRecords (patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, treatment) VALUES (3, 'Alice Johnson', 'Headache', 'Fluids') ON CONFLICT (patient_id) DO UPDATE SET patient_name = EXCLUDED.patient_name, diagnosis = EXCLUDED.diagnosis, treatment = EXCLUDED.treatment;
UPSERT INTO patients (id, name, age, gender, diagnosis) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 30, 'Male', 'Cold')
UPSERT INTO patients (id, name, age, gender, diagnosis) VALUES (2, 'Jane Smith', 25, 'Female', 'Fever')
UPSERT INTO patients (id, name, age, gender, diagnosis) VALUES (3, 'Alice Johnson', 40, 'Female', 'Allergies')
UPSERT INTO patients (patient_id, patient_name, age, gender) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 35, 'Female') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE patient_name='Alice', age=35, gender='Female';

UPSERT INTO appointments (appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, doctor_name, department) VALUES (101, 1, '2022-01-10', 'Dr. Smith', 'Cardiology') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE appointment_date='2022-01-10', doctor_name='Dr. Smith', department='Cardiology';

UPSERT INTO medical_records (record_id, patient_id, doctor_name, diagnosis, treatment) VALUES (201, 1, 'Dr. Johnson', 'Fever', 'Prescribed antibiotics') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE doctor_name='Dr. Johnson', diagnosis='Fever', treatment='Prescribed antibiotics';

UPSERT INTO patients (patient_id, name, age, gender, diagnosis, admission_date, discharge_date) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 30, 'Male', 'Fever', '2023-01-05', '2023-01-10') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), age = VALUES(age), gender = VALUES(gender), diagnosis = VALUES(diagnosis), admission_date = VALUES(admission_date), discharge_date = VALUES(discharge_date);

UPSERT INTO doctors (doctor_id, name, specialization, hospital_id, experience_years, contact_number) VALUES (1, 'Dr. Smith', 'Cardiology', 1234, 10, '123-456-7890') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), specialization = VALUES(specialization), hospital_id = VALUES(hospital_id), experience_years = VALUES(experience_years), contact_number = VALUES(contact_number);

UPSERT INTO appointments (appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, time_slot, status) VALUES (1, 1, 1, '2023-01-15', '10:00 AM - 11:00 AM', 'Confirmed') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE patient_id = VALUES(patient_id), doctor_id = VALUES(doctor_id), appointment_date = VALUES(appointment_date), time_slot = VALUES(time_slot), status = VALUES(status);

UPSERT INTO healthcare_provider (provider_id, provider_name, provider_type, address, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'Healthcare Provider 1', 'Type A', '123 Provider St', '123-456-7890') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE provider_name = 'Updated Provider 1', provider_type = 'Type B', address = '456 Provider St', phone_number = '111-222-3333';

UPSERT INTO patient (patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender, patient_dob, patient_address, patient_phone) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'Male', '1990-01-01', '123 Patient St', '555-555-5555') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE patient_name = 'Updated John Doe', patient_gender = 'Female', patient_dob = '1991-01-01', patient_address = '456 Patient St', patient_phone = '999-999-9999';

UPSERT INTO appointment (appointment_id, patient_id, provider_id, appointment_date, appointment_type, appointment_status) VALUES (1, 1, 1, '2022-01-01 10:00:00', 'General Checkup', 'Scheduled') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE appointment_date = '2022-02-01 11:00:00', appointment_type = 'Follow-up', appointment_status = 'Confirmed';
